properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_INQUIRE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT INQUIRE_NO, INQUIRE_TITLE, INQUIRE_ENROLL_DATE, INQUIRE_STATUS, INQUIRE_EMAIL, INQUIRE_SEP, USER_ID FROM TB_INQUIRE IQ LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE IQ.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY INQUIRE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
